name: MathWorks Simulink Model
summary: Learn about .MDL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Flight Simulator X Steam Edition

content: MDL files are saved in a plain text format and typically include a list of objects. Each object contains a set of properties and values that are delimited by line breaks.
NOTE: The MDL format was replaced by the .SLX model format with the release of Simulink 2012.

description: An MDL file is a simulation model created using Simulink, a simulation and model-based design application. It contains the block diagram and block properties of a simulation.

instructions: You can open an MDL file in MathWorks Simulink. If you do not have MathWorks Simulink, you can open an MDL file using any text editor, including:
If you cannot open an MDL file in MathWorks Simulink, you can try changing the file's extension to SLX. This will usually allow you to open the file in Simulink.
